title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center (Las Vegas, NV) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: Took over a month, Human Resources was difficult to reach but still made it. Wasn't that clear what they wanted and not wanted. Overall a bit of a pain and pretty tiring
Interview Questions: Why this hospital? How long have you been a CNA?

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center (Las Vegas, NV) in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: It was a smooth very friendly environment . The questions were straight to the point. The interviewer was very direct with what the position entitled and was open to any questions that I had.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: My interview was a panel interview with the director, supervisor, and manager.  Asked about a few situational questions such as chain of command and how to manage a complex patient. They also asked about past experiences and why you became a nurse.
Interview Questions: What did you go into nursing

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Quick phone call, the process was easy. Couldn’t get a good read on if the interview went well but the position was offered the next day.  Although, it was not a permanent position.

title: Certified Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center (Las Vegas, NV) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: First step is uploading your resume to the main hospital website. Applying for the position, an email will be sent to you when someone is reviewing your information, if they are interested another email will be sent with a link to do a personality test. Be very careful when answering. If you do not pass you will not get an interview, once you pass they will call you in for an interview.
Interview Questions: Explain your credentials? How would your co-workers or classmates describe you? Tell me about a difficult time you had and how you dealt with it? Use 3 words to describe yourself? Do you live within 30 minutes of our location? If you could use one word what would your classmates  describe you as?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center (Las Vegas, NV) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions: personal interview with the unit director, blood tests, contract signing  depending on what status they are going to give you (New grad program or GAP program), orientations depending on your unit.
Interview Questions: reasons why you want to work in spring valley hospital

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: They Ask you how many hours you can work. The interview process was pretty fast. You go to an orientation and get a few shots and then you’re a volunteer.
Interview Questions: How many hours you do want to do

title: ER RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center (Las Vegas, NV) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Seated in front of several staff members some of which are bedside RN's and some are management as they ask questions.  There is a panel that asks questions but several members of the staff are allowed to watch and possible participate with questions at the end of the process.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Spring Valley Hospital

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center (Las Vegas, NV) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions:
one to one direct interview with unit manager after taking computer competence test. 
After passing the test, the unit manager escorted me to her office for the interview. 
You need to pass the written test to be able to have an interview.
Interview Questions: what can you contribute to this company?

title: PACU RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Spring Valley Hospital Medical Center (Las Vegas, NV) in May 2011
Interview Descriptions: Met with charge RN and Director, and was introduced to the staff and to the unit after the short interview process, the interview process was between the charge nurses and the director of surgical services.
Interview Questions: Most of the questions stemmed around patient care, and staff caomorodiry
